extensionDesc.message: To prevent the YouTube homepage from becoming a mess, block videos you donâ€™t want to see, and let YouTube keep suggesting new content through these blocks.

blockVideoKeywordNote.message: Block videos by keywords //EX: Adding 'aaa' will block all videos with 'aaa' in the title

blockViewCountNote.message: Block videos by entering the maximum number //EX: Entering '1000' will block all videos with less than 1000 views (For numbers over 10,000, please enter as 11000, 12000, etc.)

blockChannelKeywordNote.message: Block channels by keywords //EX: Adding 'aaa' will block all channels with 'aaa' in the channel name
